text: Alice Braga (April 15, 1983) is a Brazilian actress who has appeared in American and Brazilian movies. She played Beth in Repo Men. She also played Anna Montez in I am Legend. She was born in São Paulo, Brazil. She is the niece of the Brazilian actress Sônia Braga. ==References== Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Alice Braga
